The timeline of his involvement spans from at least July 1962 to January 1963, based on the document dates. A notable pattern is his association with high-level discussions and decisions regarding covert actions and policy related to Cuba during a critical period.
significance: Based on the documents, Mr. Hilsman's significance in the JFK context lies in his involvement in covert operations and policy decisions related to Cuba during the period leading up to the assassination.
